name: Guinea Worm Cases - WHO (2018)
title: Guinea Worm Cases - WHO (2018)
description: We excluded all countries that the WHO labelled as "guinea worm not endemic in the 1980s" from this dataset as these countries never documented any cases of guinea worm disease.

sources.name: World Health Organisation (2018)
sources.dataPublisherSource: National government reporting to the WHO
sources.additionalInfo: We excluded all countries that the WHO labelled as "guinea worm not endemic in the 1980s" from this dataset as these countries never documented any cases of guinea worm disease.
